description.english: Fight in a battle with two or more other factions!
Achieve an overall population of 10 billions!
Achieve an overall population of 100 billions!
Achieve an overall population of 500 billions!
Hold two thirds of all star systems in a tiny galaxy!
Hold two thirds of all star systems in a small galaxy!
Hold two thirds of all star systems in a medium sized galaxy!
Hold two thirds of all star systems in a large sized galaxy!
Hold two thirds of all star systems in a giant sized galaxy!
Colonize five planets in one turn!
Fight in a battle with 4 or more other factions!
Fight in a battle with 7 other factions!
